amendment.description: Amendment sought to impose a lifetime ban on lobbying for a foreign interest on the Secretary of Commerce and the Commissioner of the International Trade Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to impose a lifetime ban on representing a foreign interest on the Commerce Department Secretary and the Commissioner of the International Trade Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the English amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 221 (Roll no. 826).
